item.description:
Car Talk: The Musical!!!
Book and lyrics by Wesley Savick
Original music Michael Wartofsky

Thursday, August 16, 2012, 6:45 p.m. (show time at 7:30 p.m.)

Central Square Theater
450 Massachusetts Avenue
Cambridge, MA 02139
www.centralsquaretheater.org/

*****From the theater website:
A new musical comedy inspired by the legendary NPR Radio show recorded in “our fair city,” and performed only blocks from where Click and Clack, the Tappet Brothers, opened their Good News Garage! Rusty Fenders, a hapless middle-aged owner of a terminally ill ’93 Kia, falls in love with Miata C. LaChassis, who guides him to the Emerald Garage, home of the Wizard of Cahs. Car Talk: The Musical!!! explores our romantic obsession with the automobile. Ultimately, the world of Car Talk: The Musical!!! is just like the radio show: More than auto repair, it’s about life, love, laughter, and the American Dream.*****

This show should be a lot of fun. I will miss listening to Tom and Ray when they cease producing new Car Talk shows in October.

I have purchased a ticket for the 7:30 p.m. play on Thursday, August 16, 2012. Ticket prices range from $20.00 to $50.00. You must purchase a ticket to attend this event. Go to 

>>>>>www.centralsquaretheater.org/<<<<<

Please indicate in your RSVP whether you have purchased a ticket (you won't get into the theater without one!).

I’ll be at the Central Square Theater by 6:45 p.m. to pick up my ticket. Seating is assigned, so we most likely won’t be able to sit as a group. But I will wait outside the front of the theater until 7:00 p.m. so we can meet before the play.

Look for the red backpack and the meetup sign.

I will wait in front of the theater after the play so we can chat and offer our reviews, and then decide if we would like a bite to eat after the show.
item.how_to_find_us: You must purchase a ticket to attend this event. Look for my red backpack and the meetup sign. See the event description for more details.
item.name: Car Talk: The Musical!!!
